name: Persica
description:
Persica is a digital toy that conceptualizes the idea of female orgasm by representing it onto a colorful, abstract, suggestive and organic touchpad.

Thought as an invitation to experiment, Persica makes an informal attempt to unfold different paths which could lead to the orgasm as a woman. Thereby, the game spotlights a few minutes level displaying different proposition of interactions that the player can experiment with their fingers.

Touch, slide, let the intensity guide you to the acme.

Available on Android Smartphone

Made by students of the Cnam-Enjmin

Laurent Gaidier - Game Designer

Agathe Loubiere - Graphic Designer

Léo Nantermoz - Programmer/Ergonomist

Louis Naudin - Sound Designer

Anaïs Riff - VFX Artist

Fiona Rosette - Game Designer

Florent Vain - Programmer
